By Alex Weprin on January 21, 2011 3:32 PM "ABC has scheduled a new primetime" Barbara Walters special focusing on people that have undergone heart surgery. A Barbara Walters Special: A Matter of Life and Death will air Friday, February 4 at 10 PM and will feature interviews with former President Regis Philbin . Bart Scott spoke for many when he talked about Ben Roethlisberger during conference championship week. "The respect we have for Ben Roethlisberger is that we don't look at him as a diva quarterback," said Bart Scott . We look at him as a football player. In this league, especially now, quarterbacks are treated pretty much like it's flag football. But he's one that's willing to take the hits and look down the barrel of a gun for his team. Tom Brady , Peyton Manning , Drew Brees , Michael Vick and Philip Rivers are all done for the season. Big Ben Roethlisberger is back in the Super Bowl. He's nothing like Aaron Rodgers . But he usually wins.
